statements: SELECT * FROM bicycle_sales;
SELECT product_name, price FROM bicycle_sales WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM bicycle_sales WHERE price > 500;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_sales ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name FROM bicycle_sales WHERE product_type = 'Mountain Bike';
SELECT * FROM bicycle_sales WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM bicycle_sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(product_name) > 5 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_type FROM bicycle_sales WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY product_type ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, product_name, price FROM bicycle_sales WHERE product_name LIKE '%Mountain%' OR product_name LIKE '%Road%' ORDER BY price DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM bicycle_sales WHERE product_type = 'Electric' OR product_type = 'Hybrid';
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Sales WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Sales GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT sale_id, total_profit FROM SalesReports JOIN Sales ON SalesReports.sale_id = Sales.sale_id WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Sales GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND unit_price > 100;
SELECT s.sale_id, s.product_name, sr.total_sales, sr.total_profit FROM Sales s INNER JOIN SalesReports sr ON s.sale_id = sr.sale_id;
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity, unit_price FROM Sales WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM Sales);
SELECT * FROM bicycles;
SELECT id, brand, price FROM bicycles WHERE price > 500;
SELECT id, brand, model FROM bicycles WHERE brand = 'Trek';
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE type = 'Helmet';
SELECT * FROM bicycles WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE brand = 'Trek' OR brand = 'Giant' ORDER BY model DESC;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY price DESC, brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, category FROM bicycles b JOIN spare_parts sp ON b.id = sp.id WHERE sp.category = 'Pedals' ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, a.name AS accessory_name FROM bicycles b JOIN accessories a ON b.id = a.id WHERE a.type = 'Lock' ORDER BY brand ASC, a.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bicycles;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE price < 500;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE brand = 'Trek';
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM bicycles;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE brand = 'Trek';
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transactions.date, bicycles.brand, transactions.total_amount FROM transactions JOIN bicycles ON transactions.product_id = bicycles.bicycle_id;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE price > 1000 AND price < 2000 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM bicycles;
SELECT brand, model, price FROM bicycles WHERE price > 500;
SELECT * FROM accessories ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM spare_parts WHERE category = 'Tires';
SELECT date, sales_total FROM sales_reports WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sales_total DESC;
SELECT * FROM bicycles ORDER BY brand ASC, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model, brand, price FROM bicycles WHERE brand = 'Trek' OR brand = 'Giant' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, type, price FROM accessories WHERE price > 50 AND type LIKE '%lock%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE category = 'Brakes' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_id, date, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
